title: Otogibanashi wo Anata ni
sinopse:
A collection of oneshots:

1. A Fairy Tale for You
   Once upon a time, a boy who wanted to be a great warrior met a girl who he always fought with. He soon fell in love with her, but she may not have done the same.

2. A Fairy Tale for You 2 ~The Jewel Princess~
   When a romanticist princess runs from a marriage that she doesn't want, she meets a battle-hardened mercenary. Can the two find something to learn from each other?

3. Carefree Maria
   Idiotic Atsushi has a secret admirer in his motherly friend Saeki, but he hasn't noticed.
